product_name: Cannondale Shop Bike Shirt - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: A moisture-wicking performance shirt with a cycle-savvy look, the women's Cannondale Shop bike shirt keeps you comfortable whether you're riding or relaxing. The women's Cannondale Shop bike shirt features moisture-wicking and quick-drying fabric with a bit of stretch so that the shirt moves with you. Single chest pocket and single back stash pocket stow tools or small riding essentials. Semifitted. Closeout.
short_description: A moisture-wicking performance shirt with a cycle-savvy look, the women's Cannondale Shop bike shirt keeps you comfortable whether you're riding or relaxing.
